item.title: Natalee Pei & Phil Salinger named as 2022 Council on Foreign Relations Corporate Leaders
item.description: Natalee and Phil are recognized for their leadership and contributions as members of CFR’s Corporate Leaders Program, a unique professional development opportunity for rising stars.

item.title: Melissa Saphier & Sean Macrae named as 2019 Council on Foreign Relations Corporate Leaders
item.description: Melissa and Sean are recognized for their leadership and contributions as members of CFR’s Corporate Leaders Program, a unique professional development opportunity for rising stars.

item.title: Steven Kryger named 2019 Atlantic Council Millennium Fellow
item.description: Steven, a 10-year veteran of the firm, joins a class of 21 fellows who will champion the Council’s mission to build enduring relationships capable of addressing the most pressing global challenges we face.

item.title: Kevin Brennan named to 2019 Aspen Institute’s Finance Leaders Fellowship Class
item.description: Bridgewater’s Co-Head of the Investment Engine and Director of Investment Systems joins a distinguished group of 85 individuals across 19 countries who will focus on building the core values and perspectives necessary for effective leadership in finance and society at-large.

item.title: Melody Rollins Named to INvolve’s 2022 EMpower Executive Role Model List
item.description: Supported by Yahoo Finance, the EMpower Role Model Lists recognize leaders who are breaking barriers for people of color within their workplace and beyond.

item.title: Rutendo Chigora Named to EMpower’s 2022 Ethnic Minority Future Leaders list
item.description: For the second year in a row, Investment Associate Rutendo Chigora has been named to the EMpower Ethnic Minority Future Leaders List, recognized for her longstanding commitment to expanding opportunity at Bridgewater and beyond.

item.title: Nicole Schmidt Selected for 2022 CSIS Women’s Global Leadership Program
item.description: Nicole joins a select class of 24 women leaders as part of a one-year fellowship designed to deepen their understanding of critical geopolitical trends in order to thrive in a complex and competitive global environment.

item.title: Bridgewater’s Transition Milestone
item.description: Earlier this week, Ray Dalio, Bob Prince, Greg Jensen, and Co-CEOs Nir Bar Dea and Mark Bertolini signed the agreements providing for the transfer of control of Bridgewater from Ray to the Operating Board of Directors, successfully finalizing the terms of this transition.

item.title: Atul Narayan named to 2020 the Center for Strategic and International Studies Abshire-Inamori Leadership Cohort
item.description: Atul joins a group of leaders from across the US and around the globe, to address the intellectual, ethical, cultural, and policy questions that are central to effective leadership in today’s world.
